Simulate a Multiplayer Game of Blackjack

simulate_blackjack_game.Rd

Simulates a round of Blackjack for multiple players against a dealer. Players use a basic decision strategy to hit or stand. The dealer follows standard rules and hits on soft 17.

Usage

simulate_blackjack_game(num_players = 1, seed = NULL)

Arguments

num_players

Integer. Number of players (default is 1).

seed

Optional integer to set random seed for reproducibility.

Value

A list containing each player's hand, score, result, and the dealer's final hand and score.

Examples

simulate_blackjack_game(num_players = 2, seed = 123)
#> === Dealer ===
#> Hand: 5♦ 2♥ Q♥ 
#> Score: 17 
#> 
#> === Player 1 ===
#> Hand: A♥ 3♠ J♦ 
#> Score: 14 
#> Result: Dealer wins! 
#> 
#> === Player 2 ===
#> Hand: 3♣ 4♣ J♣ 
#> Score: 17 
#> Result: Tie! 
#>
